title: Google\Cloud\Bigtable\V2\MutateRowRequest
name: MutateRowRequest
description:
Request message for Bigtable.MutateRow.

Generated from protobuf message google.bigtable.v2.MutateRowRequest

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.table_name
params.description: Required. The unique name of the table to which the mutation should be applied. Values are of the form projects/<project>/instances/<instance>/tables/<table>.

params.name: data.app_profile_id
params.description: This value specifies routing for replication. If not specified, the "default" application profile will be used.

params.name: data.row_key
params.description: Required. The key of the row to which the mutation should be applied.

params.name: data.mutations
params.description: Required. Changes to be atomically applied to the specified row. Entries are applied in order, meaning that earlier mutations can be masked by later ones. Must contain at least one entry and at most 100000.
